diff_hunk:
@@ -1,12 +1,25 @@
 # frozen_string_literal: true
 module NavHelper
-  SOC_CONTROLLER = %w(conferences projects applications application_drafts teams users)
+  SOC_CONTROLLER = %w(conferences projects applications application_drafts teams community).freeze
body:
Maybe make the constant plural?  🚗 
And I try to find an alternative for the SOC prefix. Which is getting less meaningful, first with the teams, and now with the community added too.
Can we do without the SOC_ part?
